graphical

Class GameSceneCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphical.GameSceneCreator

  • public class GameSceneCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    GameSceneCreator.java - This class is responsible for creating, styling and assigning functionality to the Game Scene.
    Author:
    Iliya Kiritchkov

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSceneCreator

        private GameSceneCreator()
        Default constructor for the GameSceneCreator. The constructor assigns all children in the Game Scene to their parents and creates a Game Scene.

    • Method Detail

      • addAllSceneFunctionality

        private void addAllSceneFunctionality()
        Adds the button and pane functionality to the scene

      • addAllSceneStyling

        private void addAllSceneStyling()
        Adds all node styling to the scene.

      • setClient

        public void setClient(Client c)
        Sets the client variable contained in this class. The client contains information on the player and their opponent.
        Parameters:
        c - Client object to be stored

      • getSceneCreator

        static GameSceneCreator getSceneCreator()
        Gets the static class instance of the GameSceneCreator. This class uses a Singleton pattern in order to maintain only one instance of the GameSceneCreator class at any time.
        Returns:
        gameSceneCreator

      • getScene

        public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
        Gets the game scene that has been created by the GameSceneCreator.
        Returns:
        gameScene - game scene that contains the entire play area, including instructions and chat log

      • displayChatMessage

        public static void displayChatMessage(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String chatMessage)
        Updates the chat log in the game scene to show the new message. Includes the username and the chat message. Plays a sound when the opponent sent the new chat message.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the chat message to be displayed
        chatMessage - chat message to be displayed

      • updateGameScores

        public static void updateGameScores(int playerNewPoints,
                                    int opponentNewPoints)
        Updates the game score of the player and their opponent in the game scene. Once both scores are updated, the player's card are enabled. Requires both player and opponent score. The points passed in are added to the existing scores in the game scene.
        Parameters:
        playerNewPoints - points to be added to the player's score
        opponentNewPoints - points to be added to the opponent's score

      • updateOpponentHandAndTable

        public static void updateOpponentHandAndTable(int opponentCard)
        Updates the opponent's hand by removing a single card, updates the opponent's table by removing the existing card and replaces it with the opponentCard that is passed in.
        Parameters:
        opponentCard - card to be displayed on the opponent's side of the play table

      • resetGameScreen

        public static void resetGameScreen()
        Resets the game scene creator and all static variables.

      • showGameOverScreen

        public static void showGameOverScreen(java.lang.String question)
        Displays the game over screen and asks the player if they want to play again.
        Parameters:
        question - question about playing again

      • receiveResponse

        public void receiveResponse(boolean response)
        Receives the response to the game over question. Calls the client to send a response to the server.
        Parameters:
        response - response to the game over screen question
